snippet: It was down to the wire for those series, as well as the first-year shows "Up All Night" and "Whitney," which was probably holding on by one hand as the last helicopter was taking off from NBC headquarters.
abstract: It was down to the wire for those series, as well as the first-year shows "Up All Night" and "Whitney," which was probably holding on by one hand as the last helicopter was taking off from NBC headquarters.

headline.main: A Reprieve for NBC Comedies, Including 'Community' and 'Parks and Recreation'
